JS Reading & Startup Matchmaker due Oct. 28, 2013

Assignment

  • Watch What Can You Do With Javascript?
  • Watch How to Learn How to Code
  • Read Chapters 1 & 2 of Eloquent JavaScript
    • Chapter 1: Introduction
    • Chapter 2: Basic JavaScript: values, variables, and control flow
  • Finish building the Startup Matchmaker website.
    • Required: The homepage
    • Optional: Developers, and Designers pages
    • Super Bonus: “How it Works”, “Our Team”, and/or “Blog” pages

Note

I am only making the homepage of the Startup Matchmaker site required, because there is quite a bit of watching and reading that I’m assigning. Please take some time to at least look over all of the materials, even if you aren’t able to watch everything through or read everything in detail. The second chapter of Eloquent JavaScript covers much of the same material we will be going over on Monday, so even if it is difficult to follow, it should make our discussion on Monday that much more palatable for you.

  • Watch Web Design for Non-Designers
  • Continue to practice HTML and CSS using Dash
